name: market group for liquefied petroleum gas | liquefied petroleum gas | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/20182/documentation

This dataset is a market group. Market groups represent a 'market of markets'. Their purpose is to group a set of markets into larger, geographically relevant datasets.;Market groups are created for convenience and ease of use. They only group other markets and/or market groups contained within their geography.;Losses and relevant exchanges (transport, transport infrastructure, etc.) are not included in this dataset. They are present in the contained markets.  ;This is the market group for 'liquefied petroleum gas', in the Global geography.

This activity starts at the gate of markets that deliver 'liquefied petroleum gas', in geographies contained within the geography of this dataset.

This activity ends with the supply of 'liquefied petroleum gas',  to the consumers of this product within the geography of Global.
category: C:Manufacturing/19:Manufacture of coke and refined petroleum products/192:Manufacture of refined petroleum products/1920:Manufacture of refined petroleum products

processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: The composition is based on the relative production volumes represented by the inputs (markets and market groups). Any extrapolation in these inputs therefore affects this dataset.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Represents all markets contained in the geography of the dataset.
